alert.note: Alert for Benton; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:16AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Benton and southwestern Linn Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 215 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Van Horne, or near Vinton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Vinton, Hiawatha, Robins, Center Point, Fairfax, Atkins, Palo, Shellsburg, Newhall, Van Horne, Alburnett, Garrison, Toddville, Benton City Park, Pleasant Creek State Recreation Area, Hoefle-Dulin Park, Lafayette, Benton County Fairgrounds and Morgan Creek Park. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 14 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
